Job Title: Brand Partnership DirectorLocation: United States (Remote with required travel to events and meetings)

About Love Music Global:

Love Music Global is at the forefront of orchestrating unforgettable music experiences, connecting fans, artists, and brands through high-profile tours and live events. With three massive tours lined up this year, we are poised to redefine live music sponsorship, offering unparalleled exposure to brands looking to connect with their audience in deeply impactful ways.
Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Brand Partnership Director to spearhead our brand partnership efforts, with a keen focus on securing advertising and content showcasing opportunities at major artist shows. This role demands a high-energy individual capable of making 100 cold calls a day, a strategist who knows how to navigate and engage decision-makers across the U.S., and a closer who meets and exceeds ambitious targets.
Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to achieve a quarterly target of $500K by securing brand partnerships for advertising and content display at our live music events.
• Conduct extensive market research to identify and engage potential brand partners, leveraging a deep understanding of the unique value proposition of live event advertising compared to traditional media.
• Make 100 cold calls daily to potential partners, building relationships and presenting tailored proposals that align with their marketing objectives.
• Work closely with the marketing and event planning teams to integrate brand content seamlessly into live events, ensuring a high-impact audience experience.
• Maintain a comprehensive CRM database to track interactions, progress, and conversions with prospective and current partners.
• Provide regular reports on sales activities, pipeline, and forecasted revenue to senior management, adjusting strategies as necessary to meet targets.
Ideal Candidate Profile:
• Proven track record in sales, partnership development, or business development, ideally within the entertainment, media, or advertising industry, with a history of meeting or exceeding significant sales targets.
• Exceptional communication and presentation skills, with the ability to connect with and persuade senior-level executives.
• Strong negotiation skills and the ability to close deals effectively and efficiently.
• Self-motivated and disciplined, with the ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
• Passionate about music and live events, with an understanding of the unique opportunities they present for brand partnerships.
• Willingness and ability to travel as required for meetings, pitches, and events.
• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field preferred.
Compensation:
• Base Salary: $70,000 - $100,000, dependent on experience.
• On Target Earnings (OTE): Up to $250,000 in the first year, based on meeting sales targets.
• Comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and vision insurance, and paid time off.
Application Process:

Interested candidates must submit a CV highlighting relevant experience and accomplishments. Additionally, applicants are required to send a short video (2-3 minutes) pitching the benefits of advertising a brand’s content at a live event, akin to a Super Bowl ad. Creativity, persuasiveness, and clarity will be key evaluation criteria.
How to Apply:

Send your CV and video pitch to careers@lovemusicglobal.com with the subject line “Brand Partnership Director Application.”
• Only candidates with relevant experience and a demonstrated track record of sales success will be considered.
